text: Bride - to - be Pippa Middleton gets pampered at top London spa ahead of wedding The 33 - year - old is set to tie the knot with James Matthews on Saturday With just five days to go before her big day, Pippa Middleton took some time out of last - minute wedding preparations on Monday to attend a top London spa. The bride - to - be was spotted leaving the Santi London beauty spa in South Kensington, described as a ` ` beautiful cross between an uber - boutique spa and a beauty clinic'', which prides itself on tailor - made treatments for its clients. The spa offers an extensive menu ; from a £70 aromatherapy massage, to a £60 Santi Glow facial treatment, which combines skin polishing and oxygen infusion to fully renew the skin
